content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Feb 2019What is the possibility of downgrading a hospitalization insurance (IP plan) from coverage of private/class A to class B?2 answersAnswerBump0

Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 11 Feb 2019Basically 100% possibility its yes. Why would you though? It's not a 100% for upgrading. 0 comments0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 11 Feb 2019Shouldn't have any issues if you're still healthy. Insurers are more than happy for you to downgrade. 0 comments0
